description.text: CodeLighthouse provides CS Challenges for everyone that is enlightened enough to take on them. Whether you are an individual, student, teacher, company, recruiter, we got your back!

highlights.title: Teachers, listen up!
highlights.text: Have you ever wanted to assign differentiated tasks to your students? Well know that now you can! With CodeLighthouse you can create a lighthouse and add your students to help them reach enlightenment!

highlights.title: Individuals / student, pay attention!
highlights.text: If you want to hone your CS skills you found the right app. You cna choose to solve any available coding challenge in a variety of languages. See just how enlightened in CS you are!
